text: BOH nikoly ne tyahari dusha poza yoho zasobamy: do yoho kredytu shcho tse zaroblyaye, ta proty tse - shcho tse zdiysnyuye. "Nash Lord, ne zasudzhuyemo nas yakshcho my zabuvayemo abo robymo pomylky. Nash Lord, ta zakhyshchayete nas z blaspheming proty Vas, lyubyte tsi pered tym, yak ny zrobyly. Nash Lord, zakhyshchayutʹ nas z hrishachykh do tse staye nadto pizno dlya nas kayatysya. Probachte nas ta probachayutʹ nam. Vy ye nash Lord ta Mayster. Harantuyte nam peremohu nahori disbelieving lyudy
